high_consensus.description: Key rotation/revocation decision tree — scope .gitleaksignore to exact commit/path with review note.

disputed.description: Git history rewrite for committed key.
disputed.reason: Already addressed in PRD FR-1: mock key is zero-entropy, history rewrite not required

disputed.description: CSPRNG source/bit-length specification for HMAC keys.
disputed.reason: Already specified in SDD: openssl rand -hex 32 (256-bit from system CSPRNG)

blockers.concern: Git history persistence — deleting files doesn't purge from history
blockers.resolution: Already documented in PRD FR-1: mock key is zero-entropy, history rewrite not required, .gitleaksignore scoped to exact path

blockers.concern: Log redaction guarantees are hard to uphold across exception paths
blockers.resolution: Added centralized log capture test to Sprint 2 Task 2.1 acceptance criteria

blockers.concern: HMAC threat model gaps — local attacker can exfiltrate key
blockers.resolution: Threat model documented in SDD 4.2: scope is accidental corruption + untrusted local process, not full OS compromise
False positive — template token is not present in the sprint plan

blockers.concern: Timeline risk with single developer across multiple toolchains
blockers.resolution: Advisory — autonomous execution handles timeboxing via circuit breaker
